annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m making an El Presidente. This is a classic pre-prohibition cocktail that has a ton of history that reaches all the way t...
annotations.title: El Presidente | How to Drink

annotations.description: This cocktail has two possible origin stories. The first is that it was created by Eddie Wolke, An American bartender plying his trade at The Jockey Club in ...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: El Presidente

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Aged Rum
1.5oz (45ml) Blanc Vermouth
.25oz (7.5ml) Dry Curacao
1 dash Angostura Bitters
1 Barspoon Grenadine
Orange Twist


Stir and pour
Garnish with orange twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tn312Qpwbws

---

1.5oz Rum
1.5oz Lillet blanc
.25oz Curacao
Barspoon Grenadine

Stir and pour
Garnish with orange twist

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lWOHvGlYQcU
title: El Presidente
